name: World Wars from Addicting Games
description:
Ever dreamed of conquering the world? Our FREE Turn-based strategy game World Wars will turn you into a hardened military genius and a conquering hero, and you’ll have fun on your tour of duty.

March your infantry and send your tanks against formidable, battle-trained AI generals. The maps and deployments are randomly generated, so you’re guaranteed a unique experience every game.

Enlist today. World Wars wants YOU!
